trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Meghatározza, hogyan egy dokumentum nyomtatása Windows Forms-alkalmazás.

trans-unit.source: This class implements a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and adds a status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály megvalósít egy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>, és hozzáadja a állapota párbeszédpanel.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller specifies how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Egy nyomtatásvezérlőt Megadja, hogy egy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>nyomtatása.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PrintControllerWithStatusDialog class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A kezdeti tulajdonságértékek a PrintControllerWithStatusDialog osztály egy példányának listájáért lásd: a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Windows-űrlapokkal való nyomtatás kapcsolatos további információkért tekintse meg a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>névtér áttekintése.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Ha ki szeretné nyomtatni a Windows Presentation Foundation-alkalmazás, tekintse meg a <xref:System.Printing>névtér.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> osztály, a megadott alkalmazásburkoló <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> való foglalják magukban.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> and specifying a title for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> osztály, a megadott alkalmazásburkoló <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> és adja meg a címet a párbeszédpanel.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> való foglalják magukban.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a title for the status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>az párbeszédpanel címét tartalmazó.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ez a jelző érték beolvasása <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> nyomtatási kép szolgál.

trans-unit.source: The IsPreview checks the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> property of the underlying controller.
trans-unit.target: A IsPreview ellenőrzi a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>tulajdonság az alapul szolgáló vezérlő.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> nyomtatási kép, ellenkező esetben használt <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő feladatütemezési határozza meg, hogy mikor és hogyan oldal egy dokumentum nyomtatása befejeződik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>osztály meghívja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódust a beágyazott <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: A OnEndPage módszer neve után azonnal a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>kiváltja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>esemény.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Ha a rendszer kivételt hoz létre belül egy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>az esemény egy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage nem hívják meg.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>hoz létre a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amely a nyomtatóra küldött.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Után <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>neve, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>módszer beállítása az <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>egy oldal grafikus objektum.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Használata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>beállítani egy oldal, a dokumentum nyomtatása.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) OnEndPage clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: For example, külön-külön az összes lapon lap beállításait módosíthatja.) OnEndPage törli a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amíg a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metódus felszabadítja a objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a dokumentum nyomtatás alatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő feladatütemezési határozza meg, hogy mikor és hogyan dokumentum nyomtatása befejeződik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>osztály meghívja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódust a beágyazott <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: A OnEndPrint módszer neve után azonnal a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>vet fel a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>esemény.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>hoz létre a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amely a nyomtatóra küldött.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Után <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>neve, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>módszer beállítása az <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>egy oldal grafikus objektum.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Használata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>meghatározni, mikor és hogyan dokumentum nyomtatása.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while OnEndPrint deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Például akkor is 30 percig nyomtatás késleltetés vagy a nyomtatóbeállítások, a dokumentum módosítása.) A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metódus törlése a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amíg OnEndPrint felszabadítja a objektum.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a dokumentum nyomtatás alatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő feladatütemezési határozza meg, hogy mikor és hogyan oldal egy dokumentum nyomtatása kezdődik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>osztály meghívja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódust a beágyazott <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPage method is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Az OnStartPage metódus lehívásra kerül előtt közvetlenül a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>kiváltja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>esemény.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>hoz létre a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amely a nyomtatóra küldött.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, OnStartPage sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Miután <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>nevezik OnStartPage beállítása a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>egy oldal grafikus objektum.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metódus törlése a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amíg a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metódus felszabadítja a objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPage to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage segítségével állítsa be az oldal a dokumentum nyomtatása.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Például külön-külön minden oldalon lap beállításait módosíthatja.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a dokumentum nyomtatás alatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> származó oldal képviselő objektum egy <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: A vezérlő feladatütemezési határozza meg, hogy mikor és hogyan dokumentum nyomtatása kezdődik.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Az <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>osztály meghívja a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metódust a beágyazott <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: A OnStartPrint módszer neve után azonnal a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>vet fel a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>esemény.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPrint to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint segítségével határozhatja meg, mikor és hogyan dokumentum nyomtatása.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Például 30 percig nyomtatás késleltetés, vagy módosítsa a dokumentum nyomtatási beállításait.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint hoz létre a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amely a nyomtatóra küldött.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Miután OnStartPrint nevezik, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>módszer beállítása a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektumot egy oldal grafikát.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metódus törlése a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objektum, amíg a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metódus felszabadítja a objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint célszerű annak ellenőrzésére, hogy <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>érvényesek.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy a dokumentum nyomtatás alatt.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.
